Articles.Content:
Hii, I am Tox. I have been playing the first game since April 2014, but still have not done a whole lot in the game despite being one of my most played games.
Including: Career mode!
I am doing my first one ever at the moment and have done a flyby of the Mun, so hopefully, once I get a proper rocket together, my first landing will go without too many encounters with a certain physics-engine-based lifeform.
I play a very modded game and always have.
I have been around the forums for a long time, mostly just looking at my favourite mods and technical support threads.
It's nice that you've decided to emerge from lurking.
